Class FESI.Interpreter.Interpret 

FESI.Interpreter.Interpret
public class Interpret
implements InterpreterCommands
A general purpose interpreter for basic command line and GUI interfaces. Load common extensions and provide various useful if limited commands to evaluate and test scripts.

This class can be subclassed, however the interface for subclassing can evolve over time. It may be preferable to write interpreters from scratchs using this one as an example.
